text: Barbara May Theresa Werle (October 6, 1928 - January 1, 2013) was an American actress who was known for her roles in The Ed Sullivan Show, Krakotoa: East of Java, Battle of the Buldge, and in Charro. Werle was born on October 6, 1928 in Mount Vernon, New York. She studied at a Catholic High School in New York. She was raised in Los Angeles, California. Werle had one son. Werle died on January 1, 2013 in Carlsbad, California from natural causes, aged 84. ==Death== She died at age 84 on January 1, 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:People from Mount Vernon, New York
title: Barbara Werle
